explains: n. （尤指毒品）上瘾者，瘾君子；<非正式>对……入迷的人
wordGroup: drug addict 吸毒者；滥用药物者

sentences.en: The self-confessed drug addict was arrested 13 months ago.
sentences.cn: 那个招认自己是瘾君子的人13个月前被抓起来了。

sentences.en: He's only 24 years old and a drug addict.
sentences.cn: 他只有24岁，可已经是一个瘾君子。

sentences.en: She is a TV addict and watches as much as she can.
sentences.cn: 她是一个电视迷，看尽可能多的电视。
